name: Ashes of the Singularity
summary: Planet by planet, a war is raging across the galaxy. The technological singularity has given humanity the power to expand further than they ever have before. Now, they compete with each other and their sentient artificial intelligence adversaries for control of newfound worlds.
info:
• 中文名: 奇点灰烬
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RTS
  • 游戏引擎: NITROUS
  • 发行日期: 2016年3月31日
  • 官方网站: http://www.ashesofthesingularity.com/
